title: 2 Bdm-1BA Upper Triplex W/Front + Rear Yards
map_address: 12946 Walsh Ave.  #2 near 3 homes East of Alla Rd
posting_body: 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath, dry bar + part view of hills.
Custom interior painting throughout with antique light fixtures and wood blinds.
Bedrooms w/carpets + lots of closet space.
Bathroom with shower over tub + tile floors.
Huge front garden area with tables, chairs.
On-site laundry room, 1 open parking space available.
Minimum 700 credit and 13 month lease w/no security deposit.
Close to Marina #90 Freeway, Playa Vista, Glen-Alla and Chase Parks.
Walk to many restaurants, CVS pharmacy, 10 movies, Pavilions, banks and Villa Marina Shopping Center.
Located in a mainly single-family neighborhood, this unique property has a peaceful and private feeling.
Tenants vacated 7/31, but you can see a similar floor plan in an adjoining unit, by appointment.
Please leave your telephone number with emails, so we may contact you.
